title: New York 1900s in color, Trolley Ride [60fps, Remastered] avec conception sonore ajoutée
description:
I colorized, restored and created the sound design for this video of a trolley ride through the streets of 1900s New York. Immerse yourself in the vintage charm of the iconic trolleys as they weave their way through the historic cityscape, offering a nostalgic glimpse into the past, where the clatter of the rails and the timeless architecture transport you to the heart of New York City 123 years ago.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound design only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur,deflicker) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.
